Articles.Content:
My game is crashing usually when going from one thing to the next and I cant tell what it is and their is no crash report but I do have and output. 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/r5go6rbfk0pitnw/output_log.txt?dl=0

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Update

No idea whats causing this but I see a bunch of Null reference exceptions regarding procedural parts. 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/r5go6rbfk0pitnw/output_log.txt?dl=0 

By the way I have 16GB of ram and on ksp 1.2.2 with RO

Edited November 2, 2017 by flashfire2205
Fixed Link

9 hours ago, flashfire2205 said:

My game is crashing usually when going from one thing to the next

This usually happens when your system runs out of memory. You already use the 64bit executable but also basically any mod available. So there's an actual possibility that you hit the physical limit of your available memory.

It also seems like you try to use KSP 1.2.2 to play RRS/RO, but for some reason you updated at least half of your mods to versions made for 1.3.x. That could lead to compatibility issues. And there is some insane log spam generated by FAR and RPM which both are updated to 1.3.1. So I would at least try to remove them and reinstall the correct versions.

8 hours ago, Harry Rhodan said:

This usually happens when your system runs out of memory. You already use the 64bit executable but also basically any mod available. So there's an actual possibility that you hit the physical limit of your available memory.

It also seems like you try to use KSP 1.2.2 to play RRS/RO, but for some reason you updated at least half of your mods to versions made for 1.3.x. That could lead to compatibility issues. And there is some insane log spam generated by FAR and RPM which both are updated to 1.3.1. So I would at least try to remove them and reinstall the correct versions.

Most of the mods I have made sure they work with 1.2.2. As for RPM I am using https://github.com/Mihara/RasterPropMonitor/releases/tag/v0.28.1 which is marked to be for 1.2.2. An FAR Version v0.15.8.1_Lewis which is also for 1.2.2. As for my computer I have 16GB of ram

Removed it, and instead added it to original post
